UVA faculty, staff and students may use this form to recommend purchasing materials for the Library's collection, or to request purchasing items for use in course reserves.

For more information please refer to the Library's collection development policy or contact the Collection Development and Management team with any questions.

If you have problems using this form, please email your recommendation to lib-collections@virginia.edu

Recommend a Purchase

Please consider postponing your purchase recommendations for items not needed within the next few months. Print book requests will not be fulfilled until after the library resumes normal operations. Ebooks needed for current courses and research will be processed as they come in.
